data.name: Lose Control
data.detailed_description:
ARE YOU READY TO LOSE CONTROL?


Lose Control is a collection of minigames, where the controls are constantly changing. Play these unique minigames embedded in the Singleplayer and follow the story of Billie, or dive directly into the multiplayer and find out, who of your friends can adapt to increasingly absurd controls schemes the fastest.

Singleplayer

Slip into the (untied) shoes of our hero Billie, whose life slowly falls apart. Endure Billies mundane work-days and be part of her everyday life by playing exilerating minigames like:
  • Getting out of bed

  • Driving to work
  • Filling our Excel-Sheets
  • Trying to book an appointment with your boss
  • Eating
  • and many more!!!
Struggle with your life as you experience how the most boring tasks get harder and harder. Watch as Billies life is slowly deteriorating into chaos.

Multiplayer

Or experience this chaos with your friends! Jump into the multiplayer and play selected games against them online. Witness the fun of a car race, where nobody knows the control and everybody is just standing around at the starting line or driving of the edge. Try to fill in collaborative Excel-sheets against your friends, and watch them fail to write the word "Banana" multiple times, because the keys are all changed. Try to click a button with your mouse, on which both axis are inverted and where the sensitivity is turned up to full.


Lose Control is many things, but one thing it is not: predictable. Its mixture of challenging minigames, weird puzzles and an overarching narrative evades any classifyability. But fear not! It will all make sense in the end as the games development is supervised by CEO Martin Apple. His vision ensures the quality of the product.

data.short_description: Lose Control is a game about control. Lose it, regain it, lose it again and adapt to ever changing controls. Play online or follow our hero Billie, as she must break out of her mundane life, because the world around him is getting weirder and weirder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
